```{r}
library(Thakurdev)
## function "add" simply add two numbers and produces the output 

## "The sum is: "

add(2, 3)

## function "subtr" simply substract two numbers and produces the output 

## "The substraction is: "

subtr(2, 3)

## function "divi" simply divides two numbers and produces the output 

## "The division is is: "

divi(3, 9)

## fumction "multi" simply multiply two numbers and produces the oputput 

## "The multiplication is: "

multi(2, 3)

```
